document.full_text: russian prime minister vladimir putin donned skates for an ice hockey training session on friday in the latest in a series of stunts which help to keep his approval ratings high.
document.title: putin dons hockey skates in latest fitness stunt
lines_and_colors: russian prime minister vladimir putin donned skates for an ice hockey training session on friday in the latest in a series of stunts which help to keep his approval ratings high.
